resources.string: Even a clock that does not work is right twice a day.
Look after the pennies and the dollars look after themselves.
The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
A short pencil is better than a long memory.

First off, I would like to thank my friend Kristijan who shared a Udacity link which appeared on my Facebook feed. You would not be able to read this without him.

A big thank you to Catherine and Kunal for building a course for us and explaining the basics!

I have to mention my colleague Anna who made a great "Need a Hug" application, and inspired me to make something similar. You should check it out on the forums:

I would also like to express my graditude to other people who posted their practice projects and shared tipswith others.

Last, but not least, I truly appreciate the time and effort of our Forum Mentors they spent on giving a truly constructive feedback.
